mapper.insert: insert into AM_PERSONAL_CERTIFICATE (CERTIFICATE_ID, PERSONAL_ID, CERTIFICATE_SN, CERTIFICATE_ISSUEDBY, CERTIFICATE_STARTTIME, CERTIFICATE_ENDTIME, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, DELETE_DATETIME, CERTIFICATE_PICTUREURL, CERTIFICATE_NAME, CERTIFICATE_PICTURE) values (#{certificateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateIssuedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{certificateEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{certificatePictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificatePicture,jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.select: select CERTIFICATE_ID, PERSONAL_ID, CERTIFICATE_SN, CERTIFICATE_ISSUEDBY, CERTIFICATE_STARTTIME, CERTIFICATE_ENDTIME, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, DELETE_DATETIME, CERTIFICATE_PICTUREURL, CERTIFICATE_NAME, CERTIFICATE_PICTURE from AM_PERSONAL_CERTIFICATE
